docs.snippet: College football fans wanted a playoff system, and now they have one. But it may just exacerbate the problems with the sport....
docs.lead_paragraph: College football fans wanted a playoff system, and now they have one. But it may just exacerbate the problems with the sport.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column maintains that College Football National Championship will only serve to intensify less savory elements of sport like commercialism, ruthless recruiting battles, exorbitant coaches' salaries and outsized importance placed on athletes.

headline.main: College Football Playoff May Be a Boon, or Just a Pandora’s Box
headline.print_headline: Playoff May Be a Boon, or Just a Pandora’s Box

docs.snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal says he has been overwhelmed by the support he has received from fans even after defeats but, if he does not act to strengthen his defence, he might soon find their patience running out....

docs.snippet: The football coach takes his baggy khakis along, creating a trend, as he moves to the University of Michigan....
docs.lead_paragraph: The football coach takes his baggy khakis along, creating a trend, as he moves to the University of Michigan.
docs.abstract: Ann Arbor, MI, retail stores report sudden rise in popularity of men's khaki pants when former San Francisco 49ers coach Jim Harbaugh, who is known for wearing baggy khakis, moved there to become head football coach at University of Michigan.

headline.main: Jim Harbaugh Inspires a Run on Khakis at Michigan
headline.print_headline: Jeans? Coach Says You’re Out of Uniform
